# GState

# Properties

# align - Align

# characterSpacing - Number

# dashPattern - DashPattern

# fillColor - Color

# fillOpacity - Number

# font - any

# fontSize - Number

# justifyUsingWordSpace - Boolean

# leading - Number

# lineBreak - Boolean

# lineCap - LineCap

# lineJoin - LineJoin

# lineWidth - Number

# miterLimit - Number

# rotate - Number

# rotateBasePoint - BasePoint

# scale - any

# scaleBasePoint - BasePoint

# strokeColor - Color

# strokeOpacity - Number

# textAlign - TextAlign

# translate - Point

# wordSpacing - Number

# Methods

# color(Color color)

  • Props:
    • color- Color
  • Returns: GState

# dashPattern(Number dash, Number space=null, Number phase=null)

  • Props:
    • dash- Number
    • space- Number, defaults to "null"
    • phase- Number, defaults to "null"
  • Returns: GState

# font(String | Font font=HELVETICA, Number size=14)

  • Props:
    • font- String | Font, defaults to "HELVETICA"
    • size- Number, defaults to "14"
  • Returns: GState

# opacity(Number opacity)

  • Props:
    • opacity- Number
  • Returns: GState

# translate(Number x, Number y)

  • Props:
    • x- Number
    • y- Number
  • Returns: GState

# align(Align align)

  • Props:
    • align- Align
  • Returns: GState

# characterSpacing(Number characterSpacing)

  • Props:
    • characterSpacing- Number
  • Returns: GState

# dashPattern(DashPattern dashPattern)

  • Props:
    • dashPattern- DashPattern
  • Returns: GState

# fillColor(Color fillColor)

  • Props:
    • fillColor- Color
  • Returns: GState

# fillOpacity(Number fillOpacity)

  • Props:
    • fillOpacity- Number
  • Returns: GState

# justifyUsingWordSpace(Boolean justifyUsingWordSpace)

  • Props:
    • justifyUsingWordSpace- Boolean
  • Returns: GState

# leading(Number leading)

  • Props:
    • leading- Number
  • Returns: GState

# lineBreak(Boolean lineBreak)

  • Props:
    • lineBreak- Boolean
  • Returns: GState

# lineCap(LineCap lineCap)

  • Props:
    • lineCap- LineCap
  • Returns: GState

# lineJoin(LineJoin lineJoin)

  • Props:
    • lineJoin- LineJoin
  • Returns: GState

# lineWidth(Number lineWidth)

  • Props:
    • lineWidth- Number
  • Returns: GState

# miterLimit(Number miterLimit)

  • Props:
    • miterLimit- Number
  • Returns: GState

# rotate(Number rotate)

  • Props:
    • rotate- Number
  • Returns: GState

# rotateBasePoint(BasePoint rotateBasePoint)

  • Props:
    • rotateBasePoint- BasePoint
  • Returns: GState

# scale(def scale)

  • Props:
    • scale- any
  • Returns: GState

# scaleBasePoint(BasePoint scaleBasePoint)

  • Props:
    • scaleBasePoint- BasePoint
  • Returns: GState

# strokeColor(Color strokeColor)

  • Props:
    • strokeColor- Color
  • Returns: GState

# strokeOpacity(Number strokeOpacity)

  • Props:
    • strokeOpacity- Number
  • Returns: GState

# textAlign(TextAlign textAlign)

  • Props:
    • textAlign- TextAlign
  • Returns: GState

# translate(Point translate)

  • Props:
    • translate- Point
  • Returns: GState

# wordSpacing(Number wordSpacing)

  • Props:
    • wordSpacing- Number
  • Returns: GState
